abstract: New York State Police and attorney general's office announce arrest of Kordell Jackson, Joshua Perkins and Ken Youngren in connection with sale of over 100 illegal assault weapons from Jackson's gun shop near Rochester; federal investigators began tracking weapons sold from store in 2014; authorities say cache represents largest seizure of guns made in New York State since passage of Secure Ammunition and Firearms Enforcement Act, authorized after 2012 mass shooting in Newtown, Conn.
lead_paragraph: It was the largest firearm seizure by the New York attorney general’s office since the state passed the SAFE Act after the 2012 mass shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School.

headline.main: 3 New York Men Accused of Selling Over 100 Illegal Assault Weapons
headline.print_headline: 3 Men Accused of Selling Illegal Weapons

snippet: It was the largest firearm seizure by the New York attorney general’s office since the state passed the SAFE Act after the 2012 mass shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School.
